Dump of extracted and cleaned txt from 2179 arXiv articles with license http://creativecommons.org/licenses/publicdomain/

File path is based on arXiv identifier (see http://arxiv.org/help/arxiv_identifier):
- old style  archive/YYMMNNN -> YYMM/archiveYYMMNNN.txt.gz
- new style  YYMM.NNNN       -> YYMM/YYMM.NNNN.txt.gz

Created at Thu Jul 31 17:17:11 2014
